long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Marmalade checks if a website you are visiting is eligible for Avios.

If the website does offer Avios for purchases, Marmalade will automatically apply for the reward. A pop up will appear letting you know the reward has been applied.

If the reward cannot be applied automatically, Marmalade will prompt you to visit the Avios store so you never miss a reward again.
